channel.title: Music – Portugal. The Man
channel.description: Recent content in Portugal. The Man on Music

item.title: Portugal. The Man - Feel It Still
item.description:
작곡: Willia.., Eric Andrew Howk / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 91162 / KY: 23191

Can’t keep my hands
to myself
Think
I’ll dust ’em off
Put ’em back up
on the shelf
In case my little baby
girl is in need
Am I coming out
of left field
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
I been feeling it
since 1966 now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
Let me kick it
like it’s 1986 now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
Got
another mouth to feed
Leave it
with a baby sitter
Mama
call the grave digger
Gone
with the fallen leaves
Am I coming out
of left field
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
I been feeling it
since 1966 now
Might’ve had your fill
but you feel it still
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
Let me kick it
like it’s 1986 now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
We could fight
a war for peace
(Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now)
Give in
to that easy living
Goodbye to my hopes
and dreams
Start flipping
for my enemies
We could
wait
Until the walls
come down
(Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now)
It’s time
to give a little
To the kids
in the middle
But oh until it falls
won’t bother me
Is it coming
is it coming
Is it coming
is it coming
Is it coming
is it coming back
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks yeah
Your love is
an abyss
For my heart
to eclipse now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
I’ve been feeling
it since 1966 now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
Woo I’m a rebel
just for kicks now
Let me kick it
like it’s 1986 now
Might be over now
but I feel it still
Might’ve had your fill
but I feel it still
